overview: A heterosexual man, a bisexual woman and a woman who capable of loving and being romantically involved with either gender. The paths of these three cross and this film details the trials and tribulations they endure while attempting to build an unusual love triangle free from jealousy and resentment. Can they achieve this unusual form of love in their tiny corner of the infinite universe? A story of romance and affection where one love, against all social norms, tries to be gender, number and guilt free.
